title: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
description: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even when there are no changes that need to be built. This can be misleading to users as it suggests that a build is necessary when it is not.
OB: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, regardless of whether there are any changes that need to be built.
EB: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should only be enabled when there are changes that need to be built.
SR:
1. Open the Java perspective.
2. Right-click on the project or file.
3. Observe the popup menu and check if the "Build" action is always enabled, even when there are no changes that need to be built.
